# perlrer #
Use perl regex syntax, get perl results in R!

```{r engine='perl'}
$string = 'This is a test';
print scalar $string =~ m/this/i;
```
```{r}
library(perlrer)
string = 'This is a test'
string %m% '/this/i'
```
```{r engine='perl'}
$string = 'This is a test';
$string =~ s/this/that/i;
print $string;
```
```{r}
library(perlrer)
string = 'This is a test'
string %s% '/this/that/i'
```
